body_html:
@ispirmustafa I know, this is drifting slightly from the specific issue at hand here, however... If, as you pointed out, the monitors API is deprecated, is there any effort on the way to update the core tutorial to reflect best practices in using tf.train.SessionRunHook? I saw related discussions in #7669.

Also, I did not see readily see an indication in the Release Notes. Thx, in advance for an indication.

body:
@ispirmustafa I know, this is drifting slightly from the specific issue at hand here, however... If, as you pointed out, the monitors API is deprecated, is there any effort on the way to update the core tutorial to reflect best practices in using `tf.train.SessionRunHook`? I saw related discussions in #7669.

Also, I did not see readily see an indication in the Release Notes. Thx, in advance for an indication.
